name: Hungry_Horse
text:
Hungry Horse
Hungry Horse was a city in Montana.
History
Leo Johnson was arrested in Hungry Horse on February 9, 1988, and held in a local jail overnight.
The following year, a Giant gave FBI Special Agent Dale Cooper the clue, "Leo locked in hungry horse." Twin Peaks Deputy Andy Brennan investigated this clue, discovering that it referred Leo's incarceration, thus giving him an alibi for the murder of Teresa Banks.
